item.title: Security Is a State Of Mind, Not an End State
item.description: Introduction The global threat landscape is evolving at an unprecedented rate. Cybercriminals are finding new and novel ways to exploit technology and human psychology to profit. Despite their best efforts, individuals and organizations are falling victim to breaches, ransomware, and all kinds of attacks almost every day. Why is this happening? For two main reasons: First, it’s becoming increasingly easier for cybercriminals to do their act. A decade ago, it was hard and time-consuming to come up with a malware, distribute it widely, and make a profit.

item.title: AWS Articles
item.description: This is a sample post intended to test the followings: A different post author. Table of contents. Markdown content rendering. Math rendering. Emoji rendering.
